title: OpenDeekWiki - AI-Powered Code Knowledge Base
description: OpenDeekWiki is an open-source project inspired by DeepWiki, built on .NET 9 and Semantic Kernel. It helps developers better understand and use code repositories, providing code analysis, documentation generation, and more.

fast_conversion.title: Fast Conversion
fast_conversion.description: Convert any code repository into an intelligent knowledge base within minutes

multi_language.title: Multi-Language Support
multi_language.description: Support code analysis for all mainstream programming languages

code_structure.title: Code Structure Diagram
code_structure.description: Automatically generate Mermaid charts for intuitive code architecture understanding

ai_analysis.title: AI Intelligent Analysis
ai_analysis.description: AI-based code analysis and relationship understanding

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Connect with developers, discuss and get latest updates
community.scan_tip: Use Feishu to scan this QR code and join our community

antsk.name: AntSK
antsk.description: Enterprise AI Solutions for Large Models

whuanle.name: 痴者工良
whuanle.description: Senior Developer & Tech Blogger, focusing on .NET, Go, AI

organization.title: {{name}}'s Code Repositories
organization.description: {{name}}'s code repository knowledge base, view all code documentation in one place
organization.default_description: {{name}} is a collection of code repositories providing various project source codes and documentation.

docs.title: Documentation Overview
docs.usage_description: You can view detailed documentation by clicking on repositories in the list below. Each repository contains comprehensive AI-generated documentation to help you understand code structure and functionality.
docs.code_structure_desc: Detailed explanation of project organization and main components
docs.api_docs_desc: Detailed description of key functions and interfaces
docs.implementation_desc: Implementation description of core algorithms and design patterns
docs.examples_desc: Examples of how to use and integrate the project

features.analysis: Through OpenDeepWiki as MCP Server, you can easily analyze and understand open source projects

feishu_bot.support_message: Integrate KoalaWiki into Feishu group chat for intelligent Q&A through Bot

step2.title: 2. Configure Feishu WebHook
instructions: Add a custom bot in Feishu group chat
Paste the copied URL into the WebHook address field
After configuration, you can use the Bot in group chat

step3.title: 3. Start Using
step3.description: After configuration, you can @mention the bot in Feishu group chat for intelligent Q&A and get document content and related information from the current repository.
